message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you the product for $18,000. I believe it presents a great value at this price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion, but I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position, but $18,000 is already a competitive price. How about we meet in the middle at $15,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for your counteroffer. While I appreciate the effort, I am still unable to meet at $15,000. I would like to propose $14,000 as my final offer.
